name: Start
text: Grenouille! Where have you been all day?! We've been insanely busy!
Gather what? The courage??? Come here! And hurry! Fill all these orders or you don't get pay
Huh? What are you- ... Oh, yes. Thank you boy. Toss in whatever you got

name: exit opening scene
text: Boy! You idiot! I didn't mean LITERALLY toss them! These are precious materials!

name: Close ingredients
text: Wait a minute... You only got a few of the things I sent you for!

name: Open newspaper
text: I'm sure you can! You'll be working overtime today until you get all these orders done
